comments:
I got the following NPE while trying to export a single plugin to a JAR. I
created this plugin using the PDE wizard to make a plugin with an Action Set,
tweaked the Action a bit, and ran the export wizard.

It's not your specific plugin.  This was a nasty transient bug in pde/build.
